datafield.subfield: proceedings of the 3rd Technical Conference on Hydraulic Engineering (CHE 2014), Hong Kong, 13-14 December 2014 /
editor, Liquan Xie, Department of Hydraulic Engineering, Tongji University, Shanghai, China.

Bed roughness boundary layer and bed load deposition in vegetated area of a stream -- Levee breach process by overflow using a small scale experimental model -- Velocity distribution and characteristics in unsteady open-channel flow over rough bed -- Experimental study of Manning's roughness in sparse planted open channel flow -- Lateral mixing of flows with and without non-submerged vegetation in depth-averaged 2D scheme -- Transportation and deposition of Particulate Organic Matter (POM) with sediment on vegetated area in a river -- Research on Baimao Sand Shoal waterway deep-water channel regulation idea in the lower reach of the Yangtze River -- Distribution features and transport trend of seabed sediment in Leizhou Bay -- Application of a 3d mathematical model for closure of a cofferdam in Caofeidian Harbour -- The land use changes in Qingdao from the last two decades -- Spectrum analysis of measured wave in Andaman Sea, Myanmar -- Tidal current modeling of the yacht marinas of Double Happiness Island in Xiamen -- Prediction of flow over thin-plate rectangular weir -- Parameters inversion of mortar in concrete considering the hardening process based on meso-mechanics -- Hydrological responses of the upper reaches of Yangtze River to climate change --

Research on the evolution of drainage networks in a simulated loss watershed based on fractal dimension -- Construction of campus 3D scene based on 3dsMax and Unity3D -- Evaluation on harmoniousness index system of water resources allocation -- Mean flow characteristics of wall-jets for hydraulic engineering applications -- Numerical modeling and analysis of shoreline change on Beidaihe new district coast -- Technical research on analysis of dam-break emergency evacuation -- The significance and modes of the construction of rural and urban historical and cultural landscape areas of Chenzhou -- Low beach guardian project of Lalinzhou -- Study on the effect of Sanosil on removing algae -- Indoor air quality of the storage of semi-active records in Oman -- Modeling of CO, NO[subscript x] and CO[subscript 2] due to vehicle emissions from Sultan Qaboos University in Oman -- Application of countermeasure research on rain adaptative landscape in Fujian coastal cities -- An evaporation duct prediction model based on the MM5 -- Adsorption of Cu[superscript 2+] from aqueous solution by aminated ephedra waste -- Diatomaceous Earth precoat filtration for drinking water treatment -- Lake sediment records on climate change of the Qinghai Lake catchment in Southwest China based on wavelet analysis -- The sedimentary records and climate environment evolution of Tengchong Qinghai lake since the 15.0 cal. ka BP -- Experimental analysis of low air pressure influences on the fire detection --

The summary and prospect of environment risk research on Yongjiang River basin -- Analysis of the dynamic and vapor characteristics of continuous heavy rain during 6-8 June 2013 in Guilin China -- A model-based diagnostic study of "99.6" Meiyu front rainstorm -- Scale invariance analysis of the decadal wind velocity in Henan Province -- Research on causes and stability of sand ridges in Liaodong Bag : take Majia shoal for example -- Research on performance evaluation index system of the large-exhibition project risk management -- Distribution pattern and potential ecological risk assessment of heavy metals in the sediments of Jiulong River estuary -- Study and development of early warning system for groundwater hazard in the coal mine -- Stratified cluster sampling and its application on Warner model for sensitive question survey -- Quantitative risk assessment of domino effect in LPG tank area -- Numerical simulation of heat storage of solar-ground concrete pile -- Study on the characteristics of temperature for concrete box girder -- Study of the earthquake response of self-anchored suspension bridges -- The analysis and ponder of instability and failure cause of composite subgrade in a railway project under construction -- Parametric study of blind bolted end-plate connection on structural square hollow section -- Elasto-plastic analysis on seismic response of PC continuous box-girder bridge with corrugated steel webs based on section fiber model -- Key technologies of construction control on long-span variable cross-section aqueduct with reinforced concrete box arch using cantilever erection method --

Experiment research on flexural performance of reinforced concrete beam by high titanium blast furnace slag -- Static analysis of pier base of hydroturbine with ring beam and columns -- Numerical prediction for the deformation of adjacent building foundation in Beijing metro construction -- Analysis of temperature influence on steel strut based on FLAC3D -- Comprehensive evaluation of cracking characteristics of box girder high performance concretes -- Elementary physical model to study the monogranular cohesive materials -- Connection design of concrete-filled twin steel tubes column -- The improved simplified Bishop's method considering the difference of inter-slice shearing force -- Study on effects of straight arch with two articulations structure system caused by knee -- A gradually-varied Hoek-Brown disturbance factor for analyzing an axisymmetrical cavern -- Initial establishment and application of cell membrane chromatography with mouse macrophage -- Risk of accident investigation and correlation analysis of the foundation pit.
Access restricted to authorized users and institutions.
